As we return to work, school, travel, we need a trustworthy way to comply w/ local vaccine and testing requirements. Excelsior Pass Plus will offer New Yorkers verifiable, secure access built on SMART Health Cards. #VCI #FHIR @SMARTHealthIT #OpenStandards https://www.governor.ny.gov/news/governor-cuomo-announces-launch-excelsior-pass-plus-support-safe-secure-return-tourism-and

- Josh Mandel (@JoshCMandel)
Is there any verifier sdk/library framework available or we can scan it through smart health cards framework only?
There are many SDKs around, ours is here: https://github.com/Path-Check/shc-sdk.js
Just be sure to ask for the Excelsior Pass Plus QR code. The Excelsior Pass is a different one (Very confusing for users)
We are trying to verify excelsior passes through smart health card framework https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/health-cards-dev-tools but could not verify issuers from this
It should be noted that the health-cards-dev-tools project is for issuers to validate their conformance to the specification, and shouldn't be relied on to validate end-user SHCs.
